name: Galio
title: the Colossus
w_dispalyname: Shield of Durand / Shield of Durand 2

i1.blurb: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Galio's''' next [[basic attack]] deals {{pp|15 to 180|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' magic resistance)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''total''' magic damage}}}} to its target and all enemies around it.
''Colossal Smash'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, dealing {{as|{{critical damage|100|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to all targets hit.
i1.name: Colossal Smash
notes: * {{ii|Sheen|Spellblade}} will also get converted to magic damage but will deal its damage only to the primary target.

q1.blurb: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' fires two windblasts that arc to either side before converging to the target area, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies they pass through.

When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that advances for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds to every enemy within, with the target's health ratio capped at 150 damage against {{tip|monsters}}.
leveling: {{st|Tornado Magic Damage Per Tick|{{as|2% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.6{{recurring|6}}%}} per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Total Tornado Magic Damage|{{as|6%  {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
q1.name: Winds of War
notes: * ''Spell shields'' will block the gusts damage but not the tornado's.
* {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} can block each windblast individually.
** The tornado will not form if only one windblast reaches the target location.

w1.blurb: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|Passive - Anti-Magic Bulwark:}} '''Galio''' gains a shield that absorbs {{as|magic damage}} that lasts until broken, refreshing after not taking damage for 12 seconds.

{{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Galio''' {{ct|windup|charges|items=true,true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,melee|consume=true|spells=true,false,false,false,false}} for up to 3 seconds, {{tip|ground|grounding}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} himself by 15%, and gaining {{as|magic damage}} reduction and half of that amount as {{as|physical damage}} reduction. Charging increases ''Shield of Durand's'' radius, damage and {{tip|taunt}} duration.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Galio''' refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds, {{tip|taunt|taunts}} nearby enemies and sets their {{sti|ms|{{as|movement speed}}}} to a {{as|static 60|ms}} for {{pp|type=charge time|9|0.5 to 1.5|0 to 2|displayformula=0.5+(0.125 per 0.25 seconds charged).}} seconds.
Affected enemies take {{as|magic damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=charge time|9|key=%|0 to 200|0 to 2|displayformula=100%+(25% per 0.25 seconds charged).}}.
w1.effect_radius: {{pp|type=charge time|9|175 to 350|0 to 2|displayformula=175+(21.875 per 0.25 seconds charged).}}
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Shield|{{as|{{ap|8 to 20}}% of his '''maximum''' health}}}}

{{st|Magic Damage Reduction|{{ap|20 to 40}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}} {{as|(+ 8% per 100 '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}{{st|Physical Damage Reduction|{{ap|10 to 20}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} {{as|(+ 4% per 100 '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}
{{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|10*3 to 50*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Shield of Durand
notes: * ''Static movement speed'' means that the target is unable to modify it anymore (ex: with [[slow resist]] / {{ai|On the Hunt|Sivir}}).
** This effect is negated only if the target is slow immune (ex: {{ai|Highlander|Master Yi}}).
* After the second cast, there is a brief period where other spells can only be buffered.
* '''{{Sbc|Possible Bug}}''': The ability key does not need to be held down when buffered in other abilities except from {{ai|Winds of War|Galio}}.

e1.blurb: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' steps backwards, and after {{fd|0.4}} seconds he {{tip|dash|dashes}} forward, though not through terrain.

He stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing them and all enemies along the way {{as|magic damage}}, while also {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds. Non-champions receive 50% reduced damage.
leveling: {{st|Champion Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 240}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Reduced Magic Damage|{{ap|80/2 to 240/2}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}
e1.name: Justice Punch
notes: * '''Galio''' can cast movement effects during the ability, and buffers all other active effects.

r1.blurb: Galio grants damage reduction to an ally. After a delay Galio smashes down on the ally's original location, knocking up nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' designates the target allied champion's location at the time of cast as his landing spot, {{tip|channels}} for {{fd|1.25}} seconds, and then {{tip|dashes}} to them, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
r1.name: Hero's Entrance
